title: Illurien of the Myriad Glimpses
html:
Illurien of the Myriad Glimpses

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
@ Illurien of the Myriad Glimpses (No tile)
Difficulty 30
Attacks Engulf 2d12 special, Claw 1d4 sticky, Cast 0d8 mage spell
@ Illurien of the Myriad Glimpses (No tile)
Difficulty 30
Attacks

Engulf 2d12 special, Claw 1d4 sticky, Cast 0d8 mage spell

Base level 25
Base experience 1161
Speed 12
Base AC -4
Base MR 100
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium
Resistances fire, poison, petrification

Illurien of the Myriad Glimpses:

  • can fly.
  • can survive underwater.
  • does not breathe.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • does not have a solid form.
  • regenerates HP quickly.
  • can see invisible creatures.
  • can teleport.
  • has teleport control.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is an overlord to its kind.
  • is female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • wants the Amulet of Yendor.
  • wants the Book of the Dead.
  • waits for you to come.
  • wants the Amulet of Yendor, the Bell of Opening, the Book of the Dead, the Candelabrum of Invocation, and your quest artifact.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • cannot be tamed.

Illurien of the Myriad Glimpses, @, also known simply as Illurien, is a unique monster that appears in dNetHack and notdNetHack. She is an unsolid human that guards an artifact spellbook of secrets within a side-branch of the Neutral Quest, and is an overlord to her kind.

Contents

  • 1 Generation
  • 2 Abilities
    • 2.1 Harassment
  • 3 Messages
  • 4 Encyclopedia entry

Generation

Illurien of the Myriad Glimpses is always generated hostile.

Illurien is generated on a random square within the shrouded dispensary at level creation.

The first time she is generated, Illurien is always created with one of three artifact spellbooks: The Necronomicon, The Book of Infinite Spells or The Book of Lost Names.

Illurien never leaves a corpse upon death.

Abilities

Illurien of the Myriad Glimpses is amphibious, unbreathing, capable of flight, can see invisible, has regeneration, can teleport, has teleport control, and will pick up and collect items with a bias towards magical ones. Illurien has full monster MR and cannot be tamed.

Illurien has a unique engulfing attack, a sticky claw attack, and will attempt to cast one mage monster spell per round of combat. Her engulfing attack will envelop you only if either you or Illurien are stuck to the other - it inflicts amnesia and rusts worn armor, and deals double damage against targets with blood.

Harassment

After Illurien dies for the first time, she will cause you trouble for the rest of the game. Every 250–1250 turns, Illurien will perform one of the following actions:

  • She will cast aggravate on you. (1⁄4 chance)
  • She will resurrect on an adjacent square to you, or levelport to you if she is still alive. (1⁄4 chance)
  • Nothing happens. (1⁄2 chance)

Once you reach the Astral Plane, Illurien will cease her harassment.

Messages

A mist of blood is torn from your skin and swept into the cloud!
You took double damage from Illurien's engulfing attack.

Encyclopedia entry

A strange woman composed of tears and raindrops, Illurien of the Myriad Glimpses is a collector of information and a keeper of secrets. She appears as a dancing array of countless swirling droplets. This storm of stolen moments surrounds and creates a slender, but extremely tall, feminine form clad in gray robes.

She has no facial features other than her vivid blue eyes.

Adapted from Dungeons and Dragons 3.5 Edition Monster Manual V

'''Illurien of the Myriad Glimpses''', {{brightblue|@}}, also known simply as '''Illurien''', is a [[unique]] [[monster]] that appears in [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]]. She is an [[unsolid]] [[Human (monster attribute)|human]] that guards an [[artifact]] [[spellbook of secrets]] within a side-branch of the [[User:Chris/dNetHack/dNethack Outlands|Neutral Quest]], and is an [[overlord]] to her kind.

==Generation==
Illurien of the Myriad Glimpses is always generated hostile.

Illurien is generated on a random square within the [[shrouded dispensary]] at level creation.

The first time she is generated, Illurien [[Monster starting inventory|is always created with]] one of three artifact spellbooks: [[dNetHack artifacts#The Necronomicon|The Necronomicon]], [[dNetHack artifacts#The Book of Infinite Spells|The Book of Infinite Spells]] or [[dNetHack artifacts#The Book of Lost Names|The Book of Lost Names]].

Illurien [[Corpseless|never leaves a corpse]] upon death.

==Abilities==
Illurien of the Myriad Glimpses is [[amphibious]], [[unbreathing]], capable of [[flight]], can [[see invisible]], has [[regeneration]], can [[teleport]], has [[teleport control]], and will pick up and collect items with a bias towards magical ones. Illurien has full [[Magic resistance (monster)|monster MR]] and cannot be [[tame]]d.

Illurien has a unique [[engulfing]] attack, a [[Sticking attack|sticky]] claw attack, and will attempt to cast one mage [[dNetHack monster spells|monster spell]] per round of combat. Her engulfing attack will envelop you only if either you or Illurien are stuck to the other - it inflicts [[amnesia]] and rusts worn armor, and deals double damage against targets with blood.

===Harassment===
After Illurien dies for the first time, she will cause you trouble for the rest of the game. Every 250–1250 turns, Illurien will perform one of the following actions:

* She will cast [[aggravate]] on you. ({{frac|4}} chance)
* She will resurrect on an adjacent square to you, or levelport to you if she is still alive. ({{frac|4}} chance)
* Nothing happens. ({{frac|2}} chance)

Once you reach the [[Astral Plane]], Illurien will cease her harassment.

==Messages==
{{message|A mist of blood is torn from your skin and swept into the cloud!|You took double damage from Illurien's engulfing attack.}}

==Encyclopedia entry==
{{encyclopedia|A strange woman composed of tears and raindrops, Illurien of the Myriad Glimpses is a collector of information and a keeper of secrets. She appears as a dancing array of countless swirling droplets. This storm of stolen moments surrounds and creates a slender, but extremely tall, feminine form clad in gray robes.

She has no facial features other than her vivid blue eyes.
|Adapted from Dungeons and Dragons 3.5 Edition Monster Manual V}}
